title: Is Concord Dead On Arrival? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.24.24
description:
Head over to KindaFunny.com/store to pick up something from the new line of Portillo merch!

Blessing and Greg ask if Concord is dea on arrival and react to the new Borderlands movie trailer.

 - Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
     - GAMESCAST - is actually Screencast. Our Spoiler-free Deadpool and Wolverine review
     - The STREAM is Call of Duty Warzone
     - Once again we partnered with NVIDIA GeForce to show off all their fun tech in Call of Duty Warzone! But today, Greg Miller joins the normal stream crew of Mike Nick and Andy! Stay tuned after KFGD and Screencast for all the shenanigans, brought to you by Nvidia GeForce!
 - If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
     - You can get today’s Gregway
     - ALSO heading to San Diego Comic-Con? Come see Nick! He’ll be moderating the Behind The Scenes with Mondo panel in Room 6DE - Thursday July 25th at 4:30pm.
     - Couldn’t get a badge, no problem! He’ll also be hosting a comedy show at The American Comedy Co. Thursday night at 8pm with Mark Ellis and Friends.
     - Grab your tickets for the comedy show at kindafunny.com/sdcc
